0: The most readily apparent oddity is the corpse. The body hangs idly from a surprisingly sturdy ceiling fan. On the floor below the body sits a small black coffee table, accompanied by a two-seater couch of the same color. Against the nearest wall, a dusty television rests atop a small stand. Through a sliding glass door against the far wall, you can see the balcony.
body: Mr. Syzygy's face face, craned upward at an unnatural angle toward the ceiling, has taken on an uncomfortable shade of blue.
